item1:
转储记录数据查询
Query the log of bin to bin transfer
item2:
可查询库位状态及产品明细数据
Can query the status of the location and article details
item5:
库存信息的查询条件
Query conditions for inventory information
item6:
转储记录数据
Bin to bin transfer log data
item7:
如果无符合条件的数据，系统将提示查无此库位信息
If there is no eligible log data, the system will prompt you to find no such location information
item8:
1. 输入查询条件后点选Query查询库位数据
Enter query conditions and click Query to query the location data
item10:
可以查看回报SAP状态
You can view and report SAP status
